Features.change_log: Added a `available_package_types` action to catch various fatal errors in Activity streams.

Bugfixes.change_log: Backported [e8ec7fb](https://github.com/ckan/ckan/commit/e8ec7fb06325f792a2159b2d9f92c1cb664a8fa2) to fix a major issue with Resource updating and patching in regards to the Resource ordering.
Fixed an issue with the Success and Failure flash messages not rendering properly in the `resource-reorder` JS module.
Fixed an issue with some templates and chained actions assuming their parent plugins were loaded.
